++ Git Detatched HEAD

+++ SUMMARY

  * think of a detached HEAD as a temporary branch without a name.

  * Situation when you check out a commit (or tag) instead of a branch. 
    * Imagine this as a temporary branch without a name
    * instead of having a named branch reference, we only have HEAD. 
    * It will still allow you to make commits (which will update HEAD),
